The files in this directory need to be deployed into the following target directories:

=> jboss/server/default/deploy/JFire.last
  * JFireServerManager-ds.xml

=> jboss/server/default/data/jfire/template
  * db-default-ds.template.xml
  * db-derby-ds.template.xml
  * ... (all other template files)
  * jdo-datanucleus-1.0-persistence.template.xml
